Review.Titre: Very dissapointed
Review.Contenu: Very dissapointed, about memberpress for the fact the cyber monday and blackfriday was all fake. You guys icresed the prices before the black friday and when you cut it down you came to the exact same price as it was before the black friday. You are so fake and this is annoiyng. I know this because i wanted to purchase memberpress before the pro version was 260 dolars. When i looked during black friday there was saiyng that you decresead the price from 700 and aomething to 260 so in what universe did you discount the prices???? Everything is just a scam!

Review.Titre: Not good with Ajax and multiple subscriptions
Review.Contenu: Memberpress does not support Ajax and also not good for multiple subscriptions :(Until we figured all this out was after 14 day refund so now they claim that there is no refund.

Review.Titre: Not worth the money.
Review.Contenu: After one year, I had to left.The only positive experience was with the support. They were really nice and helpful. And they better be, because you are going to need them constantly...This is just a really low-quality product. Constant errors issues, no possibility to ask questions for the course's members, when some other plugin updates, memberpress has problems, half-done translation (which make you look really unprofessional), constant spamming even though you are paying them already, they try to make it impossible to stop the subscription... etc

Review.Titre: Useless unresponsive support and…
Review.Contenu: Useless unresponsive support and terrible functionality. Can't even change up the style of my logins or specific widgets. Everything has to be done through code. I got this for one client and will never recommend it again. Very stressful and hopeless experience.

Review.Titre: I had called/emailed about an automatic…
Review.Contenu: I had called/emailed about an automatic charge just to inquire and ask for assistance and no one got back to me 😞

Review.Titre: Money-grabbing and appalling customer service
Review.Contenu: Appalling customer service and false advertising - after paying for the top Pro package ($599 a year for 5 sites), discover that staging/dev sites are not included.  This is despite their own blog articles saying how important staging is and on their FAQs (updated 2nd September 2021) it says:If I purchase the basic, and am only allowed one site, do I have to migrate to and from a dev (test) site?Even with MemberPress Basic you are allowed to have one live site and one Dev site with the same license,  so you will have no issues installing on both sites.However doesn't work, and their useless customer support keeps ignoring me pointing out the comment on their website and says I have to either pay, or just remove the licence from production and put onto dev every time I want to test things.  No other premium plugin I pay for requires this - they all recognise staging.domain.com as staging (or in the case of Jetpack, supply you with some code for the WPconfig).Their attitude to someone who's paid that much for a plugin is appalling considering their plugin is the most expensive and I've only added it to the tech stack to make integration with the CRM a bit easier - now going to explore how to just use the others without it (as I previously used to). I won't support a money-grabbing developer who doesn't seem to understand the importance of staging.  Or at the very least offer heavily discounted staging licences if on a domain that has a full one.

Review.Titre: You will be locked out if you do not renew - Warning
Review.Contenu: Edit: Memberpress are trying their hardest to have this review removed. It has been edited umpteen times but it stands firm as the only things here are facts.It's very important to note that the subscription model has changed. Once your subscription runs out, memberpress locks you out of the memberpress dashboard until you reactivate it by renewing your subscription.I am copy/pasting from their own website to mitigate this being taken down again.---What happens when my subscription ends?You enter a grace period where MemberPress will still operate as usual.After the grace period ends:You won’t have access to any of the MemberPress admin screens. ----In more detail: Everyone should be aware that the subscription model has changed from previous versions of Memberpress since the company was brought out. Previously the plugin would work like almost all other Wordpress plugins in as much as the the software is released under a GNU Public License and the fee you pay is effectively for 12 months of plugin updates & customer support. With this model, if you didn't renew a subscription, your plugin would still work perfectly well, it was just outside the support and update contract.Memberpress on the other hand have changed the way they want to work, and now, once your 12 month subscription is up, the plugin will lock you out of the Memberpress dashboard options so you can no-longer manage any of your memberships; you are completely and totally locked out from accessing your own data.The ONLY way to keep using the plugin fully is to keep paying whatever fee they ask for which will unlock your dashboard for another 12 months. My advice is to avoid at all cost, this is unethical and goes against the spirit of open source Wordpress plug-in development which traditionally requests payment for support and security updates - it is not forced payment.If your business relies on memberpress they can effectively force you to pay whatever fee they come up with to retain full functionality of your website.Google "Memberpress locked out" for more on this within the Wordpress community...My advice is to buy from ThemeForest who offer LIFETIME updates.

Review.Titre: I wish there were zero stars as an option
Review.Contenu: If there were zero stars as an option, I would give Memberpress that rating. They're a sham!In their documentation, they say they will give you a full-14-day money-back guarantee - but in reality, you'll never get your money back because they use delay tactics to answer any of your questions.Most times, it took us 4 days to get a response. Just 4 questions will have you go beyond the refund limit of 14 days.Memberpress is a dud and almost cost us AUD$700 when the price was exchanged from Australian dollars to US dollars.It was an expensive lesson. What's worse, we researched the hell out of them before starting - but you can only rely on their word - which was full of fraudulent lies.

Review.Titre: MemberPress Review
Review.Contenu: MemberPress bills itself as The “All-In-One” Membership Plugin for WordPressMemberPress will help you build astounding WordPress membership sites, accept credit cards securely, control who sees your content and sell digital downloads... all without the difficult setup.This statement comes off of the MemberPress front page.Other things they said they offered with the membership we bought:* Advanced Paywall Options* Full Subscription Management* Full Transaction ManagementHere's the reality.* Poorly written tutorials that were difficult to follow* Poor support. Sometimes I had to wait for 4 days to get a response.* The software was not easy to use.* They have several options for credit cards, PayPal (3 options), Stripe and pay by check. *The reality.* None of the PayPal integrations worked. I spent 10 hours going back and forth with PayPal and MemberPress and all of the integrations failed.* I installed Stripe and according to the software, the installation was perfect. The first and only time it was used, it failed.* The affiliate program was not automated, as we were led to believe. The manual setup was a deal breaker.* When we asked for a refund, despite all of the problems, they stated that we went outside of the refund time and refused to refund the money.+++ In my opinion, this is fraud. Whatever you do, don't buy this software. The company IS NOT trustworthy.

Review.Titre: The plugin is fine - but the support is lousy
Review.Contenu: The plugin is fine - but the support is lousy. They keep emailing to say our card has expired and our service is at risk - but no matter how many times I email them with screen prints of their own system showing an annual payment made in March 2023 - on a card that expires in 2027 - they do not answer the email and just keep sending the same email that our card has expired.

Review.Titre: Lack of reporting on individual people
Review.Contenu: Lack of reporting on individual people. I need to know exactly what has been completed in a course by people and their is no option for me to see this. I am also getting a lot of bots which we put security measures up and somehow this still happens. Also quizzes finally became available and doesn't even work on some of my courses. I'm frustrated with memberpress over all. Formatting, reporting and function are very hit or miss.

Review.Titre: canceling the service is a nightmare
Review.Contenu: the cancellation process is out of control, it had at least 5 screens when you are trying to cancel the service.

Review.Titre: What the Hell...
Review.Contenu: I think you need to give me time to figure out how to use it before you ask how well I like it... Sending me an email every day kinda makes me cringe.

Review.Titre: I was pleased to see the addition of…
Review.Contenu: I was pleased to see the addition of the courses module and I've used it to build one course. However, I'm designing a curriculum of 3 courses and there are several feature requests I've submitted that have not been addressed. This is forcing me to look at another LMS which has all of the features I desire and more. Tell me please, why is it taking so long for MemberPress to react to and address feature requests? I find this very frustrating when I would much prefer to use the LMS provided by a service that I already pay for annually. Do you have a dedicated team for addressing feature requests for the courses module?

Review.Titre: More members statistics please
Review.Contenu: I enjoyed Memberpress so far, but I wish I could track my individuel members journey on my site. I’d like to know which videos exactly a member watched and when so I could create more like this, etc. Just like in Kajabi.

Review.Titre: Frustrating cancellation process
Review.Contenu: I've been a customer with this company for a few years but have decided to cease services whilst we redesign our site. I've found cancelling the autorenewal to be frustrating. There are multiple screens/popups to get through with offers and warnings to scare you into remaining a subscriber. These screens are purposefully designed to make it difficult to leave (e.g. cancellation buttons that don't appear until you've checked multiple boxes). I'm sure someone from the company will reply that they are trying to offer value, and ensure customers understand that they will no longer have security updates if they stop paying - but realistically I think it's pretty plain why they do this!I really dislike that when you sign up you are automatically opted in for yearly renewal! In my opinion, the honest approach is to ask a customer their preference when signing up (and to make it easy  for them to opt out).Based on my recent experience I will unfortunately be considering other options when redesigning my site.

Review.Titre: I think the annual fee is excessive
Review.Contenu: I think the annual fee is excessive. The communication to resolve my issue was not satisfactory as it appeared my question was not read leading to a delayed resolution

Review.Titre: Software is well thought out and stays…
Review.Contenu: Software is well thought out and stays out of other tools expertise (page builder / theme / specialist)Addons are weaker, sometimes significantly, than core MembePress.Some setting are well hidden. Knowledge base/help search is weak. We have been unable to find reference to MemberPress names of settings and features. Some help/knowledge base seems out-of-date. That might be an impression not fact.Support is mediocre. System obscures how to request help. We have learned to expect help elsewhere and to run into assumptions of how a system should be built (multi language / forms). We have observed a correlation between difficulty of contacting support and quality.

Review.Titre: I would love to have features like....
Review.Contenu: I would love to have features like post date specific restrictions rules. For example, with premium u get to see all content (many years of posts and material) but with silver you get to see content posted between September 1st 2022 and June 31 2023 only. Not before. Or a automatic upgrade from a free to a paid membership asking for bank details at first to subscribe the free, or to have the ability to restrict some of the content for trials and unlock it once it becomes a paid mmship. All the rest, fabulous!

Review.Titre: I use memberpress for my wordpress courses and memberships
Review.Contenu: I use memberpress for my wordpress site. I have several different courses with one-off or payment plan payments as well as a monthly membership with monthly payments.memberpress has been really simple to use. If I had any questions the support has been quick and helpful.I would recommend using them if you are looking into finding a way to take payments from wordpress.

Review.Titre: Simple way to get there!
Review.Contenu: MemberPress is a simple solution for creating a membership site. I have never done it before but I found it easy to navigate through the set up.Five stars go for the support they offer.The minus is for the fact that if you want your own design things get complicated.

Review.Titre: I like memberpress a lot but there’s room to grow
Review.Contenu: I like memberpress a lot.I wish there was a way for members to “like” content or to designate it as a “favorite” — this is also feedback my members have given me.I also wish that there was some way to create a forum for connection, questions, and commentary.

Review.Titre: New user - video course is helpful!
Review.Contenu: I recently started building my membership site with MemberPress. The video course has been helpful in getting things up and running. I would love additional courses that build upon the basic course and improve customer usability and troubleshooting tips.

Review.Titre: Perfect for fast membership site development
Review.Contenu: The plugin is perfect for making a membership site fast with little effort. I am using course plugin and missing more template development options from developer's perspective. Some advanced template managing system with API for courses.

Review.Titre: I came across Memberpress by accident but...
Review.Contenu: I came across Memberpress by accident but it has turned out to be just the membership plugin that I was looking for. Memberpress has a lot of useful features, add-ons and integrations that make it easy to use alongside other WordPress plugins. The thing that stood out the most to me is their customer service. If your just getting started with Membership plugins and are new to how to run a membership website as I am, you should definitely consider Memberpress.

Review.Titre: Great Membership plugin
Review.Contenu: We've used MP on a few client sites and it's a great plugin. Support is good and they always email back with advice and code samples. Code samples we have tried have always worked.So it is a good flexible plugin and we plan to implement many more client sites with it.

Review.Titre: Almost perfect!
Review.Contenu: Memberpress in what I was looking for: easy-to-use and intuitive, also the support team reply to any doubts very quickly. It just misses an in-build integration that enable you to charge in different currencies, and then it would be perfect!!

Review.Titre: Easy to use and efficient membership system
Review.Contenu: Easy to use and efficient membership system. Wish there were a few more options for billing setup and member management but does all the essentials.

Review.Titre: Memberpress has been a useful tool
Review.Contenu: Memberpress has been a useful tool for my association to sell and manage membership. Other tools that I have used in the past have been complex and/or expensive to integrate into our website so it has been nice to use this affordable and simple tool.

Review.Titre: Love the product but need translation
Review.Contenu: Love the product, it’s great for our needs, but would need it in French it seems to be a problem for selling subscriptions to our French audience. I tried to have it translated as stated in your resource but doesn’t seem to work for us.Thank you

Review.Titre: they have been helpful getting us set…
Review.Contenu: they have been helpful getting us set up, and are currently emailing to get a bug fixed for us - am awaiting word any day now

Review.Titre: MP is intuitive and easy to use…
Review.Contenu: MP is intuitive and easy to use compared to WooCommerce our first choice abandoned after painful years of use.

Review.Titre: Happy Customers since 2015
Review.Contenu: Our company has been using MemberPress since 2015 and would highly recommend it to other people/companies wanting to start or improve their subscription-based business!  Technical support is always prompt and helpful and we are happy with the improvements they are continually making to the platform.

Review.Titre: A happy newbie
Review.Contenu: Being new to MemberPress, I have found it easy to set up and the support team have been super helpful.

Review.Titre: Good and easy to use but...
Review.Contenu: I really like MemberPress. I wish it were a little more flexible and that a few features I suggested could be added such as allowing members to purchase a second of the same subscriptions to access part of a website. Each subscription would have it's own expiration date rather than roll both into one and just extend the time. I also ran into a caching issue that forced me to disable the cache completely on my website which is less than ideal. I am hanging on for now in the hopes that there will be further improvements that will prompt me to give it 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Good and stable products
Review.Contenu: Good and stable products. Good and responsive customer service. Recommended.

Review.Titre: Good option for creating a membership site
Review.Contenu: MemberPress is a good option for creating a membership site. It seems stable and provides a wealth of functionality. Some of the UI elements are a bit dated, but most of that can be fixed with a little custom CSS. Overall, it is a very good package.

Review.Titre: Cut customer service time in half
Review.Contenu: MemberPress has halved the time I spend on customer service for my membership site. There are so many routine things people can do themselves, easily, that I receive a fraction of the "help" requests I used to get. Thank you, MemberPress!

Review.Titre: Amazing so far!
I have tried all, but Memberpress is the best
Review.Contenu: very powerful, yet simple to setup

Review.Titre: Excellent plugin, lots of extensions.
Friendly and professional every time
Review.Contenu: I've been a web designer and developer for a decade now, and I learned the value of good support.   Memberpress is not only a great plugin, but the support is fast, friendly and professional every time.This is the way to go guys! Thanks for making my experience with building a membership website fun and smooth!Cheers,Stijn

Review.Titre: Memberpress stand tall amoungst competitors
Review.Contenu: Choosing Memberpress for my course creation platform was a no brainer. As a developer I’ve built a handful of websites for client using other tools and have found Memberpress to be superior!Ease of use, integrations galore and the best part is how easy it is for my clients to adapt to using the software on their own.

Review.Titre: I started using MemberPress a year ago…
Review.Contenu: I started using MemberPress a year ago for my site, which offers premium podcast feeds and courses for learning medical Spanish. I have been very happy with it. The setup is easy. The support articles and videos are succinct and easy to follow. The customer support has been top notch. Finally, and most importantly, everything works! I have not had one problem since I started using MemberPress. Robust system. I recommend it.

Review.Titre: My experience with Memberpress
Review.Contenu: This is truly a powerful piece of software and yet its usage has proven to be surprisingly simple so far.Still I have not yet used it to it's fullest and wants to capitalize on it to help launching and firmly solidify my business

Review.Titre: Great support
Review.Contenu: Great support. They took the time to find out why payments weren’t processed correctly, which in the end was due to a security setting in the hosting.

Review.Titre: Best solution you can trust
Review.Contenu: We were looking for a solution that could help us to share content (video/multimedia/courses) only for our Members.We try may ways like private sharing through youtube, google drive, selfhost video solutions. But any of them was a complete solution to track the content adoption of our members.With Member Press we find all the insights we were looking for like, user tracking, course creation, video performance, forum, link share, internal community and many more.Thank you Member Press!

Review.Titre: A clear path to build and deliver dreams for my customers
Review.Contenu: Memberpress provides clear instructions that guide me to help make good choices for my needs. I look forward to exploring new ways to provide my customers a stellar experience with the help of memberpress. I have never experienced anything like this amazing platform and will continue to use, learn and grow with memberpress.

Review.Titre: Great Support Team
Review.Contenu: We have been using MemberPress with great results and customer satisfaction for over two years now.  I'm really pleased with their support team whenever some issue arises (all issues have been minor and most are due to my learning curve).  If they aren't online for an immediate chat, their email response time is very quick, their communication is clear, and they are willing to go the extra mile, even reviewing settings on our site when needed. Give a great sense of confidence.  Thanks!

Review.Titre: The Best WP Membership Plugin
Review.Contenu: MemberPress is the best all-in-one membership and course plugin. And you can also sell access to digital downloads too! It's super easy to set up and super easy to use. You'll rarely need support because the documentation is good and code easy to follow - but in the cases that you do reach out to them, the support is top notch. Can't recommend MemberPress more highly!

Review.Titre: The perfect choice if you want to build a Membership site
Review.Contenu: I spent a lot of time researching for the perfect tools for my membership website. Eventually, I chose Memberpress, and it's a perfect choice.The initial setup took a few minutes, but to really get things set the way I wanted took a bit longer.Since it's my first membership website, I had some questions a lot the way (structure, technical, etc.).MemberPress support really is one of the best I've seen. On top of the amazing available tutorials and knowledge, they are super responsive on email support.

Review.Titre: Memberpress makes it easy
Review.Contenu: Memberpress has made it so easy to get my clients' membership sites up and running quickly. It's made such a huge difference in these challenging times, as many people shift their business online. Having used a free plugin previously, I'm really pleased I gave memberpress a try and it's more than paid for itself already

Review.Titre: MemberPress Is An Awesome Plugin For Your Online Business
Review.Contenu: MemberPress is a great solution for building a membership website. I highly recommend it to others as a trustworthy choice for setting up an online membership business.It takes a bit to learn how to use. But once you’re up and running, it’s smooth sailing. MemberPress does a great job at demonstrating how to use the plugin with valuable how-tos on their blog. They keep updating and improving as well. You can’t go wrong with MemberPress if you are using WordPress.

Review.Titre: Over 5 years and I still love memberpress
Review.Contenu: I've been using memberpress since 2017 and currently use it to run 3 different membership programs on two different domains.  Everything in MP is laid out logically and the learning curve is pretty short.If you want to run any kind of membership site, MP is a great choice.

Review.Titre: I'm really liking Memberpress so far...
Review.Contenu: I'm liking Memberpress so far! It connects and integrates with SO many of the platforms I needed it so and offers an incredible range of detailed options for setting up a membership or subscription. The only thing I'm not loving is the membership registration form. It's a little plain and I cant customize the form itself. But other than that it's been great! Thanks again guys!

Review.Titre: Superb software & support.
Review.Contenu: After much research i found the best software pluginfor our business to sell online memberships to our fitness videos perfect. Not been a developer i found the support outstanding and instant (thank you Nevena) They guided me through the process perfectly. Our rewards through using Memberpress is evident in the new subscribers. Don,t hesitate to buy its really works perfectly.

Review.Titre: The Best All-In-One Membership Plugin!
Review.Contenu: MemberPress has made creating my membership website and courses the easiest thing to set up. Especially for someone who isn't as up to date on how to set up a website on my own. I am really happy with all the features MemberPress offers. I was looking for the drip content feature and that's super hard to find but MemberPress offers it along with a great course creation platform. They also provide great customer service! Whenever I needed help setting up my pages they were super prompt and detailed in their response to help me solve my problem. I am so happy and thankful for MemberPress!

Review.Titre: From newbie to pro- you have a community
Review.Contenu: I’m new to online memberships and courses. Although there is a lot of options out there that have tutorials and “how tos” there is nothing as well put together as MemberPress.The whole platform is built around community and helping you get to your next step, wherever that may be. When I found MemberPress, I really felt like not only can I actually create my own online membership site but I will absolutely get the support I need from this community as I grow.

Review.Titre: Outstanding service
Review.Contenu: I have today received outstanding service from Nevena at MemberPress. Internet searches and pleas for guidance on forums came up with nothing. Within a few hours and many emails back-and-forth in which Nevena asked for additional information to help pin-point what I needed, the solution is now in place after Nevena wrote the few lines of CSS needed to do the job. Thank you Thank you Thank You. Outstanding service.

Review.Titre: The best choice for membership sites…
Review.Contenu: I've been using Memberpress to run my membership website for three years and it has made my life so easy. It integrates perfectly with WordPress and all plugins I've needed to run an efficient membership site. It's easy to use and it took me less than a week to create a complex membership site.

Review.Titre: MemberPress is a must-have tool!
Review.Contenu: MemberPress is a brand new tool to me and I've set up my first membership program in an extremely short amount of time because it's so simple and easy to use. The training videos and docs are super helpful as well. I highly recommend MP to anyone wanting to start a membership community and start making money fast!

Review.Titre: We finally have the business we've always wanted.
Review.Contenu: Memberpress has allowed us to completely change our business for the better. We are web designers by trade but we've always wanted to build a community behind what we do.We have now built an online course platform using Memberpress and we couldn't be happier with it. Memberpress has been easy to use and their customer service has been quick and helpful when we've needed them.Before beginning the project we planned to make the platform using Wordpress and Memberpress but thought this would only be a temporary solution until we'd need a bespoke system built. However, we're now thinking this will last us for a very long time.We finally have the business we've always wanted.

Review.Titre: I love it
Review.Contenu: Hi, i’m from Spain and I’m still learning english so, sorry for the mistakes.I’m building a memberhip website about nutrition, physical exercise and health.I compared all membership plugins available and chose MemberPress because it looked very easy to build my website as I wanted… and I nailed it!!!Everything I wanted to do I could do it! I’m not a web designer, I’m only a nutritionist with a business idea and, trust me, you will build your membership website with ease.Try MemberPress and your business will grow as much as you can imagine.

Review.Titre: Thank you memberpress
Review.Contenu: What can I say - thank you.  I battle to setup the system for members that need to be approved first.  But wow the support was absolutly amazing.  Omar was an AMAZING help with setting up my Memberpress.  I'm not a developer but a graphic designer and his service and patients was amazing.  Omar I'm so thankful for your!!  Thank you

Review.Titre: Best, most flexible and well-supported membership plugin
Review.Contenu: I have been using MemberPress on websites for more than four years. It has an easy setup, a flexible and robust feature set and all-around great support. The number of Wordpress plugins that integrate nicely with it. I am using Learndash and Buddyboss with it and couldn't be happier.

Review.Titre: Fantastic Company and Software
Review.Contenu: Fantastic Company and SoftwareWe have been using MemberPress for years and have been very impressed with their products.  I especially love that their support team speaks "developer".  I have been able to work closely with them to fine tune my site and optimize it to fully use the capabilities for the MemberPress product suite.

Review.Titre: Easiest experience by FAR
Review.Contenu: Easiest experience by FAR. I've wanted to start a membership site since I started my business back in 2016. But many plugins, companies, and "extras" just seemed too hard/too tech (and I am NOT tech-savvy). But with MemberPress, I've been able to not only create my membership program, but MemberPress basically does all of the work for me on the backend! Once I set it up (which didn't take long at all), I was ready to rock and roll. My membership site + design were all done in ONE day. You can't beat that! Thank you MemberPress for making creating membership sites easy for those of us who aren't good at tech!

Review.Titre: Memberpress is by far the best…
Review.Contenu: Memberpress is by far the best WordPress membership plugin on the market everything you need and then some. Best of all, their customer support is top notch. They are quick to respond and provide accurate hello and feedback. Thanks memberpress!

Review.Titre: Memberpress is one of the best plugins…
Review.Contenu: Memberpress is one of the best plugins to have a site with paid and unpaid memberships. It integrates with any plugin and is terrific. The support is really good, they helped me many times and they were very fast both in solving problems and in answering.Being able to work with their plugin has been wonderful. I especially like that they have a plugin that integrates that is used to put the courses part into the platform.It's very useful if you want to build an e-learning platform.Also the price is one of the best found on the market, I have the basic plan and with just that I can integrate memberpress on 2 sites.

Review.Titre: MemberPress is easy to use
Review.Contenu: MemberPress is easy to use, has great training and support, and has allowed me to bring in membership revenue with little effort, so I can focus on content and other issues. It is well worth the cost and I received membership payments that covered the expense in the first week. I love it.

Review.Titre: It is very simple to take in hand and…
Review.Contenu: It is very simple to take in hand and build a member space where one can also sell its services and products, without having to install another plugin. I recommend it to all my clients who are always very satisfied

Review.Titre: The best change I've made!
Review.Contenu: I moved from S2Member to Memberpress and it was one of the best moves I've ever made! The product is great, but the kicker for me is how great Memberpress' support documentation and videos are. This has saved me countless times and made the experience so much less frustrating and smooth than when I was using S2Member. A welcome move!

Review.Titre: Amazing Plugin
Review.Contenu: Amazing Plugin! Constantly updating -- whether via zapier, WP bakery etc...It seems like every time I need a feature, it has magically appeared a few weeks ago :-)Keep up the great work!

Review.Titre: From an avid user and proponent!
Review.Contenu: We use memberpress on multiple sites. Its an easy way to build a membership website and with our developer edition, it provides an easy way to connect it to many of our other plugins and services we use. Can't recommend it enough!

Review.Titre: Robust and future proof
Review.Contenu: I needed a robust solution to add Members only content to one of our websites. I chose Memberpress based on reviews (just like this one). The solution is clean, well documented and works as intended. The onboarding for new users is thoughtful and well delivered (obviously the team at Memberpress listen well to user experience and use that to walk new users through the process to becoming a power user).  No matter what level you are inn web development Memberpress provides a neat and stable solution with scope to develop your membership offerings to the next level and beyond.

Review.Titre: Great membership plugin for WordPress
Review.Contenu: I've been using MemberPress for years. I can't speak highly enough of the documentation and support. Whenever I've had a question about implementing features on client websites, there is either a detailed guide in their documentation or their support helps me out. The plugin itself is also very capable. I've tried several other membership plugins and haven't been happy with them. MemberPress has a ton of features and gives you the ability to create full-featured membership sites.

Review.Titre: It was easy to set up
Review.Contenu: I'm a website designer and recently used MemberPress on a client's membership website for the first time. It was easy to set up. I've yet to customize the system emails that get sent to customers and I wish that it was a bit easier, but overall I love using it so far.

Review.Titre: I've been using MemberPress on multiple…
Review.Contenu: I've been using MemberPress on multiple website for about a year and it has been a reliable and easy to use tool for managing both free and paid memberships and access to content.It has not failed or had any issues.

Review.Titre: membership plugins
Review.Contenu: As far as membership plugins go, you will be hard-pressed to find one that is better then MemberPress. It is very simple to setup and manage membership websites and their support will be there for you when you need them.

Review.Titre: Membership site in a week!
Review.Contenu: The experience with Memberpress was great since the beginning. I was albe to structure the different access levels and go-live with the first contents in less than a week. The interface is powerful, it includes all the functionalities you need for a site of those characteristics, and it is very simple to use. Lately I've included some of the add-ons to make the site more appealing. Thanks Memberpress.

Review.Titre: Memberpress Rules!
Review.Contenu: After looking at stack options for building a membership site, I chose Memberpress to control the membership options and I have not been disappointed.1) It's functionality is perfect with what I need and with the buying options I was able to buy what I needed with room to grow.2) Their support desk is a godsend. Whilst the user experience is intuitive, I am not technically minded and when I get stuck, their help desk has always been able to answer my questions and keep me on track

Review.Titre: Memberpress is one of the best plugins…
Review.Contenu: Memberpress is one of the best plugins to have a site with paid and unpaid memberships. It integrates with any plugin and is terrific. The support is really good, they helped me many times and they were very fast both in solving problems and in answering.

Review.Titre: Number one for building member-sites. Well worth the price!
Review.Contenu: After I build my first community site using MemberPress, I've started targeting clients specifically wanting to create similar sites with a pay-wall to great content.In short, it made a task that I thought was cumbersome and long-winded fairly simple. Clients can use it themselves and it works perfectly with several modalities of page-builders and theme builders, like Beaver Builder and Oxygen. It's user-friendly and developer-friendly at the same time, while having great customer support.Ticks all the boxes.

Review.Titre: Worth every penny
Review.Contenu: Memberpress made it easy for my yoga studio to move online when we couldn’t stay open during COVID lockdown. If you already run a wordpress site Memberpress is SO EASY to use.

Review.Titre: I never saw a platform with more…

Review.Contenu: Very easy to use Extension for Wordpress. Before using it I read a lot of reviews and comparisons.I decided to buy memberpress and never had a problem. I used it for a medical member site with restricted content to read and download.Would def recommend it!

MemberPress came up again and again in the results, so I went with them. 5 months into my choice and I'm happy, my clients are happy, and I don't hesitate to recommend this company and this plugin.

Review.Contenu: I run a membership site that includes an online course and live events. MemberPress makes it so easy for me to manage my clients and content. I love the gift membership feature, and the ability to categorize content into different tiers.

Review.Titre: I have been using Memberpress for 4…
Review.Contenu: I have been using Memberpress for 4 years now and I couldn’t run my business without it. It is invaluable. I run a Wellbeing and mindfulness resource membership site for schools and teachers and Memberpress makes it so easy.

Review.Titre: The only real option for WordPress membership plugins
Review.Contenu: MemberPress is the only membership plugin I have found that works seamlessly with the existing WordPress database. With MemberPress you get a clean product that doesn't slow down your site and has all the options you'll need.

Review.Titre: Does everything it says on the tin
Review.Contenu: Does everything it says on the tin. We needed certain features to create our membership sits and MemberPress provides them all, so it was a no brainer. It also integrates seamlessly with LearnDash which is great. For the price, and the features its good value for money.

Review.Titre: Does a brilliant job!

Review.Titre: Amazing for a newbie!
Review.Contenu: I am a new membership site, and MemberPress was easy to set up for a newbie!  I love how seamlessly everything worked right away.  The directions were clear and helpful.  This definitely reduced my tech headaches!

Review.Titre: The perfect plugin for my needs
Review.Contenu: The perfect plugin for my needs. If you're building a membership site this is the easiest paywall to configure in my experience. I have NO coding knowledge and got exactly what I needed with my pro membership! It was a huge relief to find this.

Review.Titre: MemberPress is the membership plugin I trust most for my clients
Review.Contenu: Due to the global pandemic, we're all facing a new reality. Many people in the U.S. have lost their jobs and have turned to knowledge sharing as a way to put food on the table. I have found MemberPress to be an increasingly invaluable tool to empower these new entrepreneurs. I've personally been using MemberPress since it launched and it continues to get better with every release. As a developer, we love its adaptability and extensibility to handle a variety of membership models. Their support team is responsive and knowledgable as well. And I appreciate the blog content they share regularly to educate their users about the different aspects of creating a successful membership site. I highly recommend using MemberPress for all your membership site needs.

Review.Titre: Memberpress made it exceptionally easy…
Review.Contenu: Memberpress made it exceptionally easy to create a beautiful and functional membership section to my site.  When I would get stuck, the in-app prompts plus training videos allowed me to successfully navigate the challenge and learn more efficient ways to accomplish the tasks at hand.  I highly recommend Memberpress to anyone building on Wordpress for your clients.  This will change the game for you!

Review.Titre: Memberpress has been life-changing…
Review.Contenu: Memberpress has been a life-changing addition for my online business. When my site was first set up, the developer chose a different membership software that was clunky, difficult to use, and looked spammy. Switching to Memberpress has given my business so much more professionalism, and has given me the confidence to bring it to the next level.

Review.Contenu: Refreshing when a plugin just works without all the headaches associated with most third party plugins. Has been useful in allowing us to create both company directory websites as well as traditional user based websites. Will continue to use on all future websites!

Review.Contenu: Awesome product for turning your WordPress website into a fully functional membership site! Love the unmetered pricing and ease of use. Probably the best plugin for WordPress available for membership sites. Highly recommend.

Review.Contenu: When I was just starting out I must have researched EVERY membership platform in existence!!! Am I glad I landed here with MemberPress! This platform is the most powerful and versatile membership plugin on the market and as a non-techie the user experience is flawless.

Review.Contenu: Been using Memberpress for years. Simply the best membership plugin around. It does what it's supposed to do, and integrates with so many 3rd parties.

Review.Contenu: Overall, Memberpress is an excellent membership software.  Improvements in the future should include more freedom to edit the "slug" pages instead of the bland form type page.

Review.Titre: Unbeatable No. 1!

Review.Titre: Great plugin for managing membership sites!
Review.Contenu: For a relatively inexpensive WordPress plugin, it's really easy to use and the team are always improving it.When we first started using MemberPress, the ability to upload protected files for specific membership tiers was something that had to be done in a roundabout and not user-friendly way. The MemberPress team have since added an intuitive and super simple way to easily add files and it's made our job much easier!

Review.Titre: Great plugin to elevate your website
Review.Contenu: Definitely a steep learning curve for a beginner. However, should you be a power user, the options are endless and you can really tune it to give your customers a very polished experience

Review.Titre: Low cost
Review.Contenu: Low cost, feature packed. I switched to MemberPress from S2Members for the added functionality and usability. I would defiantly recommend this to anyone looking to build a paid site. Awesome support and quality code. 10/10!!

Review.Titre: I can't say enough about MemberPress
Review.Contenu: I can't say enough about MemberPress, its ease of use for a non-technological savvy first time entrepreneur. Additionally, all the tricks and tips that are sent my way via email are invaluable!!!

Review.Titre: Memberpress review
Review.Contenu: This website service is very nice. You can use it cheap price. I buy a lot from this website. The following features are available with the MemberPress Basic plan:Easy setupUnlimited membership levelsAbility to create paid content subscriptionsFully customizable access rules for all types of contentFully customizable pricing pagesCustomizable couponsContent drippingSubscription management options for usersEasy connection to PayPal Standard, PayPal Express Checkout and StripeDetailed reportingComprehensive documentation, including an excellent user manual and an email course

Review.Titre: Great support - highly recommend this plugin
Review.Contenu: I've had my Word Press website for a long time and we initially used S2Member for our membership plugin. However, that plugin had several issues and after exhausting efforts to get support, it became painfully clear that there would be no effort on their part to address the ongoing issues with their plugin. So, I switched to MemberPress. Migrating current users along with Pay Pal profiles was definitely a challenge and we ran into some issues because it wasn't a new install. What's important to point out however, is the support I received during this transition/migration. MemberPress support is always there and they respond quickly. They're very knowledgeable and have been able to resolve my issues and assist in getting everything working as designed. I couldn't be more pleased with the MemberPress support and I would highly recommend this plugin for anyone with a Word Press site.

Review.Titre: This is the only tool you need to manage your members
Review.Contenu: This is the only tool you need to manage your subscribers or members. It has a little bit stiff learning curve but once you pass that, things become fun to manage.

Review.Titre: Robust Solution Yet Simple to Implement
Review.Contenu: Being a "non techie" I was looking for a robust membership management solution that was at the same time simple to implement. I'm now in my second year.

Review.Titre: So far have been using this plugin to…
Review.Contenu: So far have been using this plugin to run a gated page writing contest and works for what I need and is simple to do what I need to have members with gated content.

Review.Titre: Memberpress - The Best Solution For A Membership Site
Review.Contenu: We really like Memberpress because it easily integrates with ourwebsite and all the features are customisable to run and blend withour website design. It is easy to set up different memberships andmember types so we can design and customise our membership siteto suit our customers and what they want and change it wheneverwe want to. The payment gateway setup is easy and we are able touse all the leading payment methods giving our customers thefreedom to choose how they want to pay. The finished result on ourwebsite delivers a professional membership site that looks good, iseasy to use for our customers and we can run and have completecontrol over it ourselves.Our main frustration with Memberpress is that it doesn't have thefacility to build and run a video membership site within it. In orderfor us to be able to deliver this using Memberpress, as ourmembership software, we have had to integrate a separate videogallery and run within its limitations.We have been working with Memberpress for a number of yearsnow and our overall experience has been excellent. The team atMemberpress is always willing to help with any technical issues andthey are constantly upgrading their product and adding to it to makeit better and easier to use. Memberpress really is the best solutionfor a membership site.

Review.Titre: Member Press has really impressed me
Review.Contenu: Member Press has really impressed me, having tried other more cheaper membership platforms that were missing features I decided to buy Member Press Plus and it has exceeded all my expectations. Well worth purchasing.

Review.Titre: I am happy to use member press :)
Review.Contenu: It has been a wonderful experience using Memberpress to manage my WordPress membership site. A top solution for those looking to start an online community and membership. It integrates with so many solutions and third party plugins.

Review.Titre: Great customer service!
Review.Contenu: The customer service I received at Memberpress was really good. They answered any questions I had on setting up our Foundation and they also offer a non-profit discount on the membership for charities! Would recommend.

Review.Titre: I had created a problem with my account…
Review.Contenu: I had created a problem with my account renewal, completely my fault. The result…renewing to the wrong package and loosing access to my multiple licences. As I said, it was completely of my own doing and not in any way caused by MemberPress itself. Having said that, the support at MemberPress was absolutely first rate. I sent them a support ticket advising of my ‘stuff up’ and within a very short time I had a response from Predrag at support assuring me the problem would be fixed. Another message followed with a couple of steps they needed me to do, followed by a confirmation that it was all sorted. Not only that, they refunded me the money that I had incorrectly paid for the wrong renewal package. And if that wasn’t enough, they actually put me on a different plan that was way more effective for my needs and a lot cheaper than what I’d been paying. Honestly, I’ve been blown away by this experience, they really did go way beyond what they needed to and I’m most grateful to them. Next year at renewal time…I’ll pay a bit more attention to what I’m actually doing, but I have no doubt that if I encounter any problems then, or in the year ahead, they will go out of their way to assists me.

Review.Titre: One of the best membership plugin for WordPress
Review.Contenu: MemberPress is of the best membership plugin I came across. It helps create a membership platform of any type within no time.I would Definitely recommend it.

When I cam across MemberPress through Google search, I had no doubt that this was the best and for sure I can testify, it was the right solution I was looking for and can recommend to anyone intending to provide the best of the best in terms of service delivery.
